resources.string: Already trained for PECS? Start Using!

• This phase will teach your child that whenever he needs an object, he needs to drag an item of that object to the communication strip.
• Take an object of child's interest and find a photo of it from the library.
• In case the image is not available in the library, an image can be uploaded from your mobile gallery.
• Place the device and object in front of the child and try asking What do you want?
• Whenever he/she tries to reach the object, grab their hand to the device guiding them to drag the picture to the communication strip.
• After the drag, give the object to the child.
• Repeat this a few times until you child learns the technique and drags the picture without any help.

• Repeat this a few times until you child learns the technique and drags the picture without any help.
